#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long  LL;
LL k, n, a[1003];

bool check(LL time)
{
    LL ans=0;
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        ans+=((time)/a[i]);
        if(ans>=n)
            return true;
    }
    return false;
}

void bs(LL l, LL r)
{
    LL ans;
    while(l<=r)
    {
        LL mid=l+(r-l)/2;
        if(check(mid))
        {
            r=mid-1;
            ans=mid;
        }
        else
        {
            l=mid+1;
        }
    }
    printf("%lld", ans);
}

int main()
{
    scanf("%lld %lld", &k, &n);
   // LL r=1000000000012;
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
    }
    bs(1, 1000000000012ll);
}
